overview: Will the life of the video blogger Gorin of Lugansk change after he encounters a UFO?  "Monkey Ostrich and Grave" is the story of the video blogger Genadi Gorin of Lugansk (the capital of the new republic, which appeared during the Russian/Ukrainian war in 2014), whose life floats parallel to the horrific reality of the unfinished war.
title: Monkey, Ostrich and Grave
